銉字的基本解释

銉
yù
针。

銉
sì
古同“肆”，古代编悬乐器的单位，悬钟十六枚为一肆。

銉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yù］
［《廣韻》餘律切，入術，以。］
针。
[②]［sì］
同“肆1”。
古代乐器悬钟的单位。一肆为十六枚。

銉字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　銉； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1304第10
【廣韻】餘律切【集韻】允律切，?音聿。針也。

銉字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
銉字的起名意思

暂无。

銉
Basic explanation of words
銉
yù
needle.
銉
sì
In ancient times, it was the same as the "Squad", the ancient unit of hanging musical instruments. Sixteen hanging bells constituted a four.
銉
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yù］
["Guang Yun" Yu Lv cut, into the operation, to. ]
needle.
[②]［sì］
Same as "Si 1".
The unit of the hanging bell of an ancient musical instrument. One for sixteen.
銉
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　銉; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 1304 No. 10
[Guangyun] Yu Luqie [Jiyun] Yun Luqie,? Yin Yu. Needle also.
